channel.title: Pod on the Apex
channel.itunes:author: Pratyush Nalam, Aniket Mohan
channel.description: Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus to your screen! New episodes every Wednesday.

item.title: Welcome to Pod on the Apex!
item.description: Are you an F1 fan? Does the sound of the engine revving excite you behind your wildest dreams? Well, you have come to the right place! Introducing #PodOnTheApex! Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus with all its action on and off the track right to your screen! Get ready for an insightful and entertaining discussion of what to look forward in the 2025 season and how these 2 gearheads started their obsession with this adrenaline-filled sport!

item.title: Ranking the 2025 F1 Liveries!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, we discuss the F1 75 extravaganza and then rank all the TEN 2025 F1 liveries! Join us, Pratyush and Aniket, for a whirlwind and fun discussion and watch us rank our favorites! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know!

item.title: 2025 Formula 1 Season Predictions - Part 1!
item.description: In this special episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket serve up some pre-season predictions! We play fortune teller with the bottom 5 constructors from the 2024 championship and throw up some hot takes along the way! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know and don't forget to stay tuned for part 2!

item.title: 2025 Formula 1 Season Predictions - Part 2!
item.description: In this special episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket serve up the second part of our pre-season predictions! It is now time to play fortune teller with the top 5 constructors from the 2024 championship and throw up some more hot takes along the way! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know!

item.title: Testing Retrospective and Awaiting Australia!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex: Did pre-season testing in Bahrain reveal the 2025 pecking order? We dive into the details! Plus, are you excited for the 2026 grid turning it up to 11? And what about the V10 comeback rumors? Join Pratyush and Aniket for the complete lowdown!

item.title: Zooming into Melbourne!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Australian GP and discuss the swearing ban as we eagerly await the five lights to go out on the 2025 F1 season!

item.title: It is a papaya world at Melbourne!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the Australian GP, preview the Chinese GP, and toss up some spicy predictions!

item.title: Catching our breath from the Shanghai drama!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the Chinese GP and unpack the shocking Liam Lawson story!

item.title: Time to dance through the Suzuka Esses!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Japanese GP, break down the paddock reactions of the Lawson-Tsunoda swap, and are thrilled about a possible V10 return!

item.title: Awaiting Sakhir after the Suzuka Snoozefest!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the sleepy Japanese GP, wonder what is going wrong at Ferrari, and look forward to more excitement from the Bahrain GP!

item.title: Looking ahead to Jeddah after a wild weekend at Sakhir!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket dive into the chaotic Bahrain GP, debate the many surprising technical failures on Sunday, and call out the subpar race direction before ending with predictions for the Saudi Arabian GP!

item.title: Piastri rules supreme at Jeddah but where is Lando?
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket unpack all the drama from the Saudi Arabian GP (including _that_ Verstappen-Piastri incident), scrutinize Lewis Hamilton's perplexing struggles, and yearn for even more inter-papaya racing action (come on Lando!) on track! Also addressed is the frustrating resurgence of dirty air and its subsequent impact on overtakes in 2025!

item.title: More Papaya Domination at Miami?
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket bring you spicy Miami GP predictions, explore the special liveries and uniforms for this weekend, look forward to Sergio PÃ©rez's potential return in 2026, commemorate Ayrton Senna's tragic accident 31 years ago, and give a sneak peek at the new Madring unveiled this week!

item.title: Prancing into the Pain at Miami!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket rue a terrible Miami GP weekend for Ferrari, salute Oscar Piastri's rich vein of form, and cautiously wonder about Jack Doohan's future!

item.title: Give Us Papaya-Flavored Tamburello Drama at Imola!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Imola GP with their patented predictions, take some more digs at the Alpine kerfuffle, and give their verdict on the updated FIA swearing guidelines!
